item.title: Trump’s Tricky Transition Math
item.description: How the narrow congressional majorities complicate Trump’s plans.

item.title: The Pardon Power: Don’t Mend It, End It
item.description: The Constitution’s pardon power is a vestige of a bygone time.

item.title: Republicans Are Having a Moment in Deep-Blue New York State
item.description: Solidly Democratic for a generation, the state is showing some signs of a political shift.

item.title: How Donald Trump Might Save Justin Trudeau
item.description: The president-elect’s trade war threat could help Canada’s beleaguered prime minister rally his nation against Trump in the coming election.

item.title: The Met’s Siena Exhibition: Lovely and Learned
item.description: Gothic Art meets the Renaissance via Duccio, Simone di Martini, and the Lorenzetti brothers.
